name: Hidden Object - Edge of Reality: Lethal Prediction
name_original: Hidden Object - Edge of Reality: Lethal Prediction
description:
Play the trial for FREE! Pay once & complete the adventure!

Can you solve the exciting mystery of "Edge of Reality: Lethal Predictions Collector's Edition" in time? Use your skills to unravel challenging hidden object puzzles, explore beautiful locations and reveal the truth before it is too late!

Mysterious accidents have been happening throughout Universe City triggering the citizens to question if someone or something is behind these deadly attacks! After your father becomes the latest victim, you decide to take matters into your own hands and start an investigation. He has gifted to you a mystical bracelet that can foresee disasters and prevent the death of others. Your trustworthy companion, Uni, is also along for the ride to help sniff out hidden objects and untangle dark puzzles. Can you rescue the people and save the town in this riveting mystery adventure?

• Test your skills through a variety of puzzles, mini games, and amazing hidden object scenes!
• Immerse yourself in a fantastic story full of colorful characters and intriguing locations!
• Unlock the full game to gain access to incredible bonus content and additional gameplay!
